mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite_properties (id, member_id, apt_seq) VALUES (#{id}, #{memberId}, #{aptSeq});
mapper.select: SELECT f.favorite_id AS id, f.member_id AS memberId, f.apt_seq AS aptSeq, f.apt_nm AS aptNm, f.land_address AS landAddress, f.road_address AS roadAddress, f.deal_amount AS dealAmount, f.deal_year AS dealYear, f.deal_month AS dealMonth, f.deal_day AS dealDay FROM favorite_property_details f WHERE f.member_id = #{memberId};
